snippet.title: Cozy Space Survivors - Release Date Trailer
snippet.description:
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2657850/Cozy_Space_Survivors/
Website: https://simonschreibt.de/cozy-space-survivors/
Developer: https://simont.de/

A cozy time survival roguelite in space. You steer the shippy while the shooting happens automatically. Meet cute NPCs, solve small quests, and fight quirky enemies with satisfying weapons. A shorter experience for people who don't have much time but love playing (and finishing) games. 

Music: https://pixabay.com/de/music/verfolgungsjagd-szene-superhero-trailer-110450/
